title: .edu
summary: The domain name edu is a sponsored top-level domain (sTLD) in the Domain Name System of the Internet. The domain was implemented in 1985 for the purpose of creating a domain name hierarchy for organizations with a focus on education, even able to be used for non-U.S.-affiliated entities. Since 2001, new registrants for second-level domain names have been required to be United Statesâ€“affiliated institutions of higher education.
